`@solution`

`@@run.R`

```{r}
runApp(appDir = '.')
```

`@@ui.R`

```{r}
library(shiny)
shinyUI(bootstrapPage(
  textInput('username', ''), textOutput('greeting')
))
```

`@@server.R`

```{r}
library(shiny)
shinyServer(function(input, output){
  output$greeting <- renderText({paste('Hello', input$username)})
})
```
